recommendations: Update vulnerable dependencies using: pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt
Replace all MD5 usage with SHA-256
Replace all SHA1 usage with SHA-256
Replace pickle usage with secure serialization (JSON/MessagePack)
Replace 0.0.0.0 bindings with specific interface addresses
Move hardcoded secrets to environment variables
